title: Random Freezes
body: Recently while playing league I've had random freezes around 1-3 times a game where the screen freezes for around 3-5 seconds but I can tab out on my computer and move my mouse still, the only things i have open while playing league is league and curse voice.

replies.body: Is your entire screen freezing, or are there specific elements freezing such as minions, champs, etc? If they are freezing, are they catching up or teleporting around after the freeze stops? Any "attempting to reconnect" messages?

No attempting to reconnect messages in game, I can still move my mouse but everything in game freezes including the clock and where everyone is.  Then it catches up in a few seconds.

It also happens right when I die sometimes but I don't really care about that because it catches up before I can respawn.

It definitely sounds like you're experiencing some bursts of packet loss, causing the delays you're seeing. I recommend you work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so as to ensure your local network settings aren't exacerbating or causing this issue to happen.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
It's really had to play with sometimes
